General.Name: Arita Prima Indonesia Tbk
General.Description: PT Arita Prima Indonesia Tbk engages in the export and import trading of metal goods in Indonesia. The company operates through Valve, Fitting, Instrument, and Others segments. The company also manufactures and trades in valve and other products; and offers repair services and equipment installation, construction, and water management services. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Jakarta Utara, Indonesia. PT Arita Prima Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Arita Global.
General.Address: Komplek Rukan Sunter Permai, Jakarta Utara, Indonesia, 14350
